greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of constant 1 + B3 (or 1 + B_3) related to the Mertens constant.
reference: S. R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Encyclopedia of Mathematics and its Applications, vol. 94, Cambridge University Press, pp. 94-98
link: David Broadhurst, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..300
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Mertens Constant
formula: B_3 = lim_{x to infty} ( log x - sum_{p <= x} log p / p ). - Dick Boland, Mar 09 2008
mathematica: B3 = EulerGamma - NSum[PrimeZetaP'[n], {n, 2, Infinity}, WorkingPrecision -> digits+50, NSumTerms -> 200];
xref: Equals 1 + A083343, the latter being the main entry for this constant.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 05 2014
